text: Edwin McGregor (February 9, 1885 - February 8, 1955Hockey deaths - February 1955) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played with the Montreal Wanderers of the National Hockey Association. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Montreal Wanderers (NHA) players Category:People from Lanark County Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers
title: Edwin McGregor
